title: A Herd of... Goats??
description: Someone spots movement on the horizon. It’s not raiders… it’s goats. A whole herd of goats. In times like these, what do we do with them?

options.text: Shady - Steaks on the menu tonight boys! Let's saddle up and take down a few!
options.outcome: No owner in sight. Pow, pow, pow! Is this hunting or sport? The men return with as many goats as they can carry.

options.text: Old-Timer - With this many there has to be an owner. Let's sneak out at night and grab a few under cover of dark.
options.outcome: You wait until nightfall. No owner in sight, a small group is rounded up quietly without creating a fuss.

options.text: Beck - Do we have to resort to violence or stealing? Have we sunk that low? Maybe the herders are interested in trading.
options.outcome: An owner never arrived and the goats moved on. A missed oportunity for sure.
